titleStmt.title: Book of Joshua, Book of Judges, Book of Ruth, Books of Kings

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.rubric: Chapter divisions are marked, corresponding approximately at those of the Vulgate
msItem.filiation: Copied from a manuscript that belonged previously to the Ethiopian Monastery in Jerusalem

msItem.note:
Generally the text agrees with Dillmann's edition, but there are some variants which are not present in any of the manuscripts used for Dillmann's edition; such as in chapter 1:
Vers. 1: ወሀሎ፡ ብእሲ፡ እምነ፡ - ሴፉ፡ - ዘስሙ፡ - ብናሴብ፡ ዘኤፍሬም።
Vers. 2: ወስማ፡ ለአሐቲ፡
Vers. 3: ወይዐርግ፡ - ወመጽአ፡ ኤሊ፡ ወደቂቁ፡
Vers. 5: ወለሐናናኒ፡ - እምነ፡ እንታክቲ፡
Vers. 6: ሣቀያ ፡ ወከመ፡ ሐዘነ፡ ትካዝ፡ ወተሐዘን፡ - ዐፀዋ፡
Vers. 7: ለለ፡ ዐመት፡
Vers. 8: ወይቤላ፡ ሐና፡ - ወምንተ፡ ያበክየኪ፡ ለምንተ፡ - እምነ፡ ዐሠርቱ፡
Vers. 9: ዲበ፡ መንበር፡
Vers. 11: ብፅዓተ፡ - ወወዝነ ፡ - ወሐጺነ፡ ኢይዐርግ ፡ ዲበ ፡ ርእሱ።
Vers. 12: ይትዐቀባ፡
Vers. 13: ወይእቲ፡ - ወታኅውሥ፡ - ወኢይሰምዓ፡
Vers. 14: እምቅድመ፡
Vers. 15: እኪት፡ - አነ is missing
Vers. 16: ለእመትከ፡ - አዋልደ፡ - እምነ፡ ብዝኀ፡
Vers. 17: ይስራኤል፡ - ስእለትኪ፡ ከመ፡ ዘሰአልኪ፡
Vers. 18: እመትከ፡
Vers. 19: ወይሐውሩ፡ በፍኖቱ፡
Vers. 20: ወወለደት፡ - እምእግ"ር፡
Vers. 21: ይሡዑ፡ - መዋዕለ፡ ብፅዓቲሁ፡ - ዕሥራተ፡
Vers. 23: ለአዕይንቲኪ፡ - ታኅድጊዩ፡ - እምነ፡ አፉኪ፡
Vers. 24: ዘሰለስተ፡ ዓመተ፡ - ኤፋ፡
Vers. 25: ወአብአ፡
Vers. 26: ወትቤሎ፡ - ሕይወተ፡ - ወበፅዓከ፡
Vers. 27: ኀቤሁ፡

msItem.colophon: Epilogus Abissinus: በ፲፻፮፻፴፯፡ እምልደተ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ለዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ አምጻእክዎ፡ አነ፡ አባ ፡ ማሕፀንተ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘማንደምባ ፡ በእንተ ፡ አእብነተ ፡ ማህትም፡ ንዋየ፡ ኢየሩሳሌም፡ ንሚጦ፡ እምድኅረ፡ ሀተምነ። At the end of , written by Māḥḍanta Māryām

item.desc: Verses are often marked with European numbers
Note by Picques En 1683 Mr Ludolf a pris copie et l'a envoyée à Hambg pour imprimer.

Note by Ludolf
Priorem partem nempe Pentateuchum hujus scripturae aethiopicae accepi a Dn. Dre Piques in hunc finem ut hoc in loco a filio meo describatur in usum publicum, prout dicto Dno Piques visum fuerit, et fideliter atque integre reddatur. Lut. Parisiorum, die 27 Febr. 1684 . J. Ludolfus.
Several ecclesiastical lessons both marginal and in the body of the text as described in 164

At the end of the Book of Ruth, asking for prayers for those who worked for the book and forYǝsḥāq, who brought the book to Jerusalem
ጸልዩ፡ ለእለ፡ ጸመውነ፡ ለዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ወለይስሓቅ፡ ገብርክሙ፡ ዘወሀበ፡ ዛቲ፡ ለኢየሩሳሌም፡ ቅድስት ።
At the end of the Book of Ruth, after gloss by Wansleben
item.quote: Hic est ille Mahzente-Marjam qui subscripsit carmini abissinico quod P. Jacobus Wemmers lexico suo abissinico praemisit, quod fuit impressum Romae a 1638 in Congreg. de Prop. fide

item.desc: Note by Wansleben with the title "Epilogus Gio. Micaelis de Vanslebiis scriptoris"
Folio by Gorgoryos with a list of all the words found in this volume that he considered to be rare, made for Ludolf
Notes by Ludolf indicating lacunae of the ethiopic version
Notes and glosses by Picques as well as some variants and translations of rubrics

history.provenance: Together with BNFet1 belonged to Picques who left it to the library of the Jacobins Saint-Honoré; it came to the Bibliothèque nationale during the French Revolution

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.
